trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class used for controlling serialization by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en abstrakt klass som används för att styra serialisering av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>klass.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for serialization that is derived from the abstract XmlSerializationWriter class.
trans-unit.target: Under initieringen av .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastruktur dynamiskt genererar och kompilerar en temporär klass för serialisering som härleds från den abstrakta klassen XmlSerializationWriter.

trans-unit.source: XmlSerializationWriter is also implemented within the .NET Framework for serialization of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects into XML documents.
trans-unit.target: XmlSerializationWriter genomförs även i .NET Framework för serialisering av <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>och <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>-objekt till XML-dokument.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: You should not derive classes from XmlSerializationWriter.
trans-unit.target: Du bör inte vara härledda klasser från XmlSerializationWriter.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Anropa i stället den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Stores an implementation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback"></xref> delegate and the type it applies to, for a later invocation.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar en implementering av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback"> </xref> ombud och den typ som den gäller för, för en senare anrop.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Skyddade medlemmar av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>är avsedd att användas endast av härledda klasser som används internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastruktur.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for serialization that is derived from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Under initieringen av .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastruktur dynamiskt genererar och kompilerar en temporär klass för serialisering som härleds från <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates write methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Under den här processen skapar .NET Framework write-metoder som implementerar det <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>Delegera.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized via SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: Detta sker så för vissa mappningar mellan .NET Framework och XML-datatyperna som serialiseras via SOAP-kodad XML inte och rotelement.

trans-unit.source: Then, as necessary, a write method is called during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Sedan kan vid behov anropas en Skriv-metoden under serialiseringen.

trans-unit.source: You should not directly create an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>.
trans-unit.target: Du bör inte direkt skapa en instans av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning beskrivs i avsnitt 5 i SOAP 1.1-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName*> method is used to write valid XML.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName*>metoden används för att skriva giltig XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A> method writes valid XML from invalid sources.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>metoden skriver giltig XML från ogiltig källor.</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.EncodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class can contain spaces, which are invalid as XML.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>klassen kan innehålla blanksteg, vilket är ogiltiga som XML.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A> method reads the encoded XML and restores it to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>metoden läser kodad XML och återställer det till det ursprungliga värdet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlConvert.DecodeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> cannot read such encoded XML.
trans-unit.target: Men den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>metod för den <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>går inte att läsa sådana kodad XML.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, set the EscapeName property to `false` to disable the encoding of the XML.
trans-unit.target: I så fall för egenskapen EscapeName `false` att inaktivera kodning av XML-filen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.FromXmlQualifiedName*> method returns an encoded name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.FromXmlQualifiedName*>metoden returnerar en kodad namn, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter.FromXmlQualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instances of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback"></xref> delegate to serialize SOAP-encoded XML data.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en instanser av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback"> </xref> ombud att serialisera SOAP-kodad XML-data.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Skyddade medlemmar av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>är avsedd att användas endast av härledda klasser som används internt i .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastruktur.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for serialization that is derived from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Under initieringen av .NET Framework XML-serialisering infrastruktur dynamiskt genererar och kompilerar en temporär klass för serialisering som härleds från <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter>

trans-unit.source: During this process, the .NET Framework generates write methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Under den här processen skapar .NET Framework write-metoder som implementerar det <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>Delegera.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>

trans-unit.source: It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized using SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements.
trans-unit.target: Detta sker så för vissa mappningar mellan .NET Framework och XML-datatyperna som serialiseras med SOAP-kodad XML inte och rotelement.

trans-unit.source: Then, as necessary, a write method is called during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Sedan kan vid behov anropas en Skriv-metoden under serialiseringen.

trans-unit.source: The abstract InitCallbacks method is where the temporary derived class creates an instance of and initializes write callback methods.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt InitCallbacks metoden är där den tillfälliga härledda klassen skapas en instans av och initierar skriva callback-metoder.

trans-unit.source: You should not directly create an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>.
trans-unit.target: Du bör inte direkt skapa en instans av <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriteCallback>

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning beskrivs i avsnitt 5 i SOAP 1.1-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element and to be referenced any number of times by substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning tillåter ett unikt XML-element visas en gång i ett SOAP-meddelande som en `multiRef` element och refereras valfritt antal gånger genom att ersätta element.

trans-unit.source: The TopLevelElement method helps keep track of the objects that can be serialized as `multiRef` elements.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TopLevelElement hjälper till att hålla reda på de objekt som kan serialiseras som `multiRef` element.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

trans-unit.source: Writes an <xref uid="langword_csharp_id" name="id" href=""></xref> attribute that appears in a SOAP-encoded <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en <xref uid="langword_csharp_id" name="id" href=""> </xref> attribut som visas i en SOAP-kodade <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> element.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning tillåter ett unikt XML-element visas en gång i ett SOAP-meddelande som en `multiRef` element som identifieras av en `id` attribut.

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times by `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: Den `id` värde kan referera till flera gånger `href` attribut (eller `ref` attribut i SOAP 1.2) i stället använda element.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning beskrivs i avsnitt 5 i SOAP 1.1-specifikationen.

trans-unit.source: The object being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Det objekt som serialiseras.

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the `nil` attribute from the XML Schema instance namespace (abbreviated `xsi`) indicates a null value.
trans-unit.target: Om värdet är `true`, `nil` attribut från namnområdet för XML-Schema-instans (förkortat `xsi`) anger ett null-värde.

trans-unit.source: The WriteNullableQualifiedNameEncoded method is called only when writing SOAP-encoded XML, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: WriteNullableQualifiedNameEncoded-metoden anropas när bara skriva SOAP-kodad XML, som beskrivs i avsnitt 5 i SOAP 1.1-specifikationen.

trans-unit.target: Det lokala namnet på XML-elementet för att skriva.

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the XML element to write.
trans-unit.target: Namnområdet för XML-elementet för att skriva.

trans-unit.source: The XML qualified name to write in the body of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: XML-kvalificerat namn att skriva i brödtexten för XML-elementet.

trans-unit.target: Namnet på datatypen XML-schemat som ska skrivas till den <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""> </xref> attribut.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>Infogar en <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:nil='true'" name="xsi:nil='true'" href=""> </xref> attribut om det strängvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The protected members of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter> are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the `nil` attribute from the XML Schema instance namespace (abbreviated `xsi`) indicates a null value.
trans-unit.target: Om värdet är `true`, `nil` attribut från namnområdet för XML-Schema-instans (förkortat `xsi`) anger ett null-värde.

trans-unit.source: The WriteNullableQualifiedNameLiteral method is called only when writing literal XML that can be defined in an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: WriteNullableQualifiedNameLiteral-metoden anropas bara när du skriver literal XML som kan definieras i en XML-schemadokument.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `<multiRef>` element identified by an `id` attribute.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning tillåter ett unikt XML-element visas en gång i ett SOAP-meddelande som en `<multiRef>` element som identifieras av en `id` attribut.

trans-unit.source: The `id` value can be referenced multiple times using `href` attributes (or `ref` attributes in SOAP 1.2) in substitute elements.
trans-unit.target: Den `id` värdet kan vara refererade flera gånger med `href` attribut (eller `ref` attribut i SOAP 1.2) i stället använda element.

trans-unit.source: SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: SOAP-kodning beskrivs i avsnitt 5 i SOAP 1.1-specifikationen.

trans-unit.target: Objekt som ska serialiseras i det aktuella XML-elementet eller en <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiRef" name="multiRef" href=""> </xref> element som refereras av det aktuella elementet.
